019package com.plotsquared.bukkit.generator;
020
021import com.plotsquared.bukkit.queue.GenChunk;
022import com.plotsquared.bukkit.util.BukkitUtil;
023import com.plotsquared.bukkit.util.BukkitWorld;
024import com.plotsquared.core.PlotSquared;
025import com.plotsquared.core.generator.ClassicPlotWorld;
026import com.plotsquared.core.generator.GeneratorWrapper;
027import com.plotsquared.core.generator.IndependentPlotGenerator;
028import com.plotsquared.core.generator.SingleWorldGenerator;
029import com.plotsquared.core.location.ChunkWrapper;
030import com.plotsquared.core.location.UncheckedWorldLocation;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
032import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.PlotAreaManager;
033import com.plotsquared.core.queue.ZeroedDelegateScopedQueueCoordinator;
034import com.plotsquared.core.util.ChunkManager;
035import com.sk89q.worldedit.bukkit.BukkitAdapter;
036import com.sk89q.worldedit.math.BlockVector2;
037import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
038import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
039import org.bukkit.HeightMap;
040import org.bukkit.World;
041import org.bukkit.block.Biome;
042import org.bukkit.generator.BiomeProvider;
043import org.bukkit.generator.BlockPopulator;
044import org.bukkit.generator.ChunkGenerator;
045import org.bukkit.generator.WorldInfo;
046import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
047import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
048import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
049
050import java.util.ArrayList;
051import java.util.List;
052import java.util.Random;
053import java.util.Set;
054
055public class BukkitPlotGenerator extends ChunkGenerator implements GeneratorWrapper<ChunkGenerator> {
056
057    private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger("PlotSquared/" + BukkitPlotGenerator.class.getSimpleName());
058
059    @SuppressWarnings("unused")
060    public final boolean PAPER_ASYNC_SAFE = true;
061
062    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
063    private final IndependentPlotGenerator plotGenerator;
064    private final ChunkGenerator platformGenerator;
065    private final boolean full;
066    private final String levelName;
067    private final boolean useNewGenerationMethods;
068    private final BiomeProvider biomeProvider;
069    private List<BlockPopulator> populators;
070    private boolean loaded = false;
071
072    private PlotArea lastPlotArea;
073    private int lastChunkX = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
074    private int lastChunkZ = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
075
076    public BukkitPlotGenerator(
077            final @NonNull String name,
078            final @NonNull IndependentPlotGenerator generator,
079            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager
080    ) {
081        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
082        this.levelName = name;
083        this.plotGenerator = generator;
084        this.platformGenerator = this;
085        this.populators = new ArrayList<>();
086        int minecraftMinorVersion = PlotSquared.platform().serverVersion()[1];
087        if (minecraftMinorVersion >= 17) {
088            this.populators.add(new BlockStatePopulator(this.plotGenerator));
089        } else {
090            this.populators.add(new LegacyBlockStatePopulator(this.plotGenerator));
091        }
092        this.full = true;
093        this.useNewGenerationMethods = PlotSquared.platform().serverVersion()[1] >= 19;
094        this.biomeProvider = new BukkitPlotBiomeProvider();
095    }
096
097    public BukkitPlotGenerator(final String world, final ChunkGenerator cg, final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager) {
098        if (cg instanceof BukkitPlotGenerator) {
099            throw new IllegalArgumentException("ChunkGenerator: " + cg
100                    .getClass()
101                    .getName() + " is already a BukkitPlotGenerator!");
102        }
103        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
104        this.levelName = world;
105        this.full = false;
106        this.platformGenerator = cg;
107        this.plotGenerator = new DelegatePlotGenerator(cg, world);
108        this.useNewGenerationMethods = PlotSquared.platform().serverVersion()[1] >= 19;
109        this.biomeProvider = null;
110    }
111
112    @Override
113    public void augment(PlotArea area) {
114        BukkitAugmentedGenerator.get(BukkitUtil.getWorld(area.getWorldName()));
115    }
116
117    @Override
118    public boolean isFull() {
119        return this.full;
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    public IndependentPlotGenerator getPlotGenerator() {
124        return this.plotGenerator;
125    }
126
127    @Override
128    public ChunkGenerator getPlatformGenerator() {
129        return this.platformGenerator;
130    }
131
132    @Override
133    public @NonNull List<BlockPopulator> getDefaultPopulators(@NonNull World world) {
134        try {
135            checkLoaded(world);
136        } catch (Exception e) {
137            LOGGER.error("Error attempting to load world into PlotSquared.", e);
138        }
139        ArrayList<BlockPopulator> toAdd = new ArrayList<>();
140        List<BlockPopulator> existing = world.getPopulators();
141        if (populators == null && platformGenerator != null) {
142            populators = new ArrayList<>(platformGenerator.getDefaultPopulators(world));
143        }
144        if (populators != null) {
145            for (BlockPopulator populator : this.populators) {
146                if (!existing.contains(populator)) {
147                    toAdd.add(populator);
148                }
149            }
150        }
151        return toAdd;
152    }
153
154    // Extracted to synchronized method for thread-safety, preventing multiple internal world load calls
155    private synchronized void checkLoaded(@NonNull World world) {
156        // Do not attempt to load configurations until WorldEdit has a platform ready.
157        if (!PlotSquared.get().isWeInitialised()) {
158            return;
159        }
160        if (!this.loaded) {
161            String name = world.getName();
162            PlotSquared.get().loadWorld(name, this);
163            final Set<PlotArea> areas = this.plotAreaManager.getPlotAreasSet(name);
164            if (!areas.isEmpty()) {
165                PlotArea area = areas.iterator().next();
166                if (!area.isMobSpawning()) {
167                    if (!area.isSpawnEggs()) {
168                        world.setSpawnFlags(false, false);
169                    }
170                    setSpawnLimits(world, 0);
171                } else {
172                    world.setSpawnFlags(true, true);
173                    setSpawnLimits(world, -1);
174                }
175            }
176            this.loaded = true;
177        }
178    }
179
180    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Kept for compatibility with <=1.17.1
181    private void setSpawnLimits(@NonNull World world, int limit) {
182        world.setAmbientSpawnLimit(limit);
183        world.setAnimalSpawnLimit(limit);
184        world.setMonsterSpawnLimit(limit);
185        world.setWaterAnimalSpawnLimit(limit);
186    }
187
188    @Override
189    public void generateSurface(
190            @NotNull final WorldInfo worldInfo,
191            @NotNull final Random random,
192            final int chunkX,
193            final int chunkZ,
194            @NotNull final ChunkData chunkData
195    ) {
196        if (platformGenerator != this) {
197            platformGenerator.generateSurface(worldInfo, random, chunkX, chunkZ, chunkData);
198        }
199    }
200
201    @Override
202    public void generateBedrock(
203            @NotNull final WorldInfo worldInfo,
204            @NotNull final Random random,
205            final int chunkX,
206            final int chunkZ,
207            @NotNull final ChunkData chunkData
208    ) {
209        if (platformGenerator != this) {
210            platformGenerator.generateBedrock(worldInfo, random, chunkX, chunkZ, chunkData);
211        }
212    }
213
214    @Override
215    public void generateCaves(
216            @NotNull final WorldInfo worldInfo,
217            @NotNull final Random random,
218            final int chunkX,
219            final int chunkZ,
220            @NotNull final ChunkData chunkData
221    ) {
222        if (platformGenerator != this) {
223            platformGenerator.generateCaves(worldInfo, random, chunkX, chunkZ, chunkData);
224        }
225    }
226
227    @Override
228    public @Nullable BiomeProvider getDefaultBiomeProvider(@NotNull final WorldInfo worldInfo) {
229        if (platformGenerator != this) {
230            return platformGenerator.getDefaultBiomeProvider(worldInfo);
231        }
232        return biomeProvider;
233    }
234
235    @Override
236    public int getBaseHeight(
237            @NotNull final WorldInfo worldInfo,
238            @NotNull final Random random,
239            final int x,
240            final int z,
241            @NotNull final HeightMap heightMap
242    ) {
243        PlotArea area = getPlotArea(worldInfo.getName(), x, z);
244        if (area instanceof ClassicPlotWorld cpw) {
245            // Default to plot height being the heighest point before decoration (i.e. roads, walls etc.)
246            return cpw.PLOT_HEIGHT;
247        }
248        return super.getBaseHeight(worldInfo, random, x, z, heightMap);
249    }
250
251    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // The entire method is deprecated, but kept for compatibility with <=1.16.2
252    @Override
253    @Deprecated(since = "TODO")
254    public @NonNull ChunkData generateChunkData(
255            @NonNull World world, @NonNull Random random, int x, int z, @NonNull BiomeGrid biome
256    ) {
257        if (useNewGenerationMethods) {
258            if (this.platformGenerator != this) {
259                return this.platformGenerator.generateChunkData(world, random, x, z, biome);
260            } else {
261                // Return super as it will throw an exception caught by the server that will mean this method is no longer used.
262                return super.generateChunkData(world, random, x, z, biome);
263            }
264        }
265
266        int minY = BukkitWorld.getMinWorldHeight(world);
267        int maxY = BukkitWorld.getMaxWorldHeight(world);
268        GenChunk result = new GenChunk(minY, maxY);
269        if (this.getPlotGenerator() instanceof SingleWorldGenerator) {
270            if (result.getChunkData() != null) {
271                for (int chunkX = 0; chunkX < 16; chunkX++) {
272                    for (int chunkZ = 0; chunkZ < 16; chunkZ++) {
273                        for (int y = minY; y < maxY; y++) {
274                            biome.setBiome(chunkX, y, chunkZ, Biome.PLAINS);
275                        }
276                    }
277                }
278                return result.getChunkData();
279            }
280        }
281        // Set the chunk location
282        result.setChunk(new ChunkWrapper(world.getName(), x, z));
283        // Set the result data
284        result.setChunkData(createChunkData(world));
285        result.biomeGrid = biome;
286        result.result = null;
287
288        // Catch any exceptions (as exceptions usually thrown)
289        try {
290            // Fill the result data if necessary
291            if (this.platformGenerator != this) {
292                return this.platformGenerator.generateChunkData(world, random, x, z, biome);
293            } else {
294                generate(BlockVector2.at(x, z), world.getName(), result, true);
295            }
296        } catch (Throwable e) {
297            LOGGER.error("Error attempting to load world into PlotSquared.", e);
298        }
299        // Return the result data
300        return result.getChunkData();
301    }
302
303    private void generate(BlockVector2 loc, String world, ZeroedDelegateScopedQueueCoordinator result, boolean biomes) {
304        // Load if improperly loaded
305        if (!this.loaded) {
306            synchronized (this) {
307                PlotSquared.get().loadWorld(world, this);
308            }
309        }
310        // Process the chunk
311        if (ChunkManager.preProcessChunk(loc, result)) {
312            return;
313        }
314        PlotArea area = getPlotArea(world, loc.getX(), loc.getZ());
315        try {
316            this.plotGenerator.generateChunk(result, area, biomes);
317        } catch (Throwable e) {
318            // Recover from generator error
319            LOGGER.error("Error attempting to generate chunk.", e);
320        }
321        ChunkManager.postProcessChunk(loc, result);
322    }
323
324    @Override
325    public boolean canSpawn(final @NonNull World world, final int x, final int z) {
326        return true;
327    }
328
329    public boolean shouldGenerateCaves() {
330        return false;
331    }
332
333    public boolean shouldGenerateDecorations() {
334        return false;
335    }
336
337    public boolean isParallelCapable() {
338        return true;
339    }
340
341    public boolean shouldGenerateMobs() {
342        return false;
343    }
344
345    public boolean shouldGenerateStructures() {
346        return true;
347    }
348
349    @Override
350    public String toString() {
351        if (this.platformGenerator == this) {
352            return this.plotGenerator.getName();
353        }
354        if (this.platformGenerator == null) {
355            return "null";
356        } else {
357            return this.platformGenerator.getClass().getName();
358        }
359    }
360
361    @Override
362    public boolean equals(final Object obj) {
363        if (obj == null) {
364            return false;
365        }
366        return toString().equals(obj.toString()) || toString().equals(obj.getClass().getName());
367    }
368
369    public String getLevelName() {
370        return this.levelName;
371    }
372
373    private synchronized PlotArea getPlotArea(String name, int chunkX, int chunkZ) {
374        // Load if improperly loaded
375        if (!this.loaded) {
376            PlotSquared.get().loadWorld(name, this);
377            // Do not set loaded to true as we want to ensure spawn limits are set when "loading" is actually able to be
378            // completed properly.
379        }
380        if (lastPlotArea != null && name.equals(this.levelName) && chunkX == lastChunkX && chunkZ == lastChunkZ) {
381            return lastPlotArea;
382        }
383        PlotArea area = UncheckedWorldLocation.at(name, chunkX << 4, 0, chunkZ << 4).getPlotArea();
384        if (area == null) {
385            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format(
386                    "Cannot generate chunk that does not belong to a plot area. World: %s",
387                    name
388            ));
389        }
390        this.lastChunkX = chunkX;
391        this.lastChunkZ = chunkZ;
392        return this.lastPlotArea = area;
393    }
394
395    /**
396     * Biome provider should never need to be accessed outside of this class.
397     */
398    private final class BukkitPlotBiomeProvider extends BiomeProvider {
399
400        private static final List<Biome> BIOMES;
401
402        static {
403            ArrayList<Biome> biomes = new ArrayList<>(List.of(Biome.values()));
404            biomes.remove(Biome.CUSTOM);
405            BIOMES = List.copyOf(biomes);
406        }
407
408        @Override
409        public @NotNull Biome getBiome(@NotNull final WorldInfo worldInfo, final int x, final int y, final int z) {
410            PlotArea area = getPlotArea(worldInfo.getName(), x >> 4, z >> 4);
411            return BukkitAdapter.adapt(plotGenerator.getBiome(area, x, y, z));
412        }
413
414        @Override
415        public @NotNull List<Biome> getBiomes(@NotNull final WorldInfo worldInfo) {
416            return BIOMES; // Allow all biomes
417        }
418
419    }
420
421}
